scenario:
Questex's Vibe Conference announced the finalists for the 2025 Vibe Vista Awards, recognizing outstanding performers in the beverage industry. The awards celebrate excellence in beverage program creation, execution, and results. 

The finalists include:

- Best Wine Program: Coury Hospitality, Seasons 52, Yaamava' Resort & Casino at San Manuel
- Best Adult Alcohol-Free Beverage Program: Hyatt Lifestyle, Lazy Dog Restaurants, Royal Caribbean International
- Best Overall: Hotel: HEI Hotels & Resorts, Kimpton Hotels & Restaurants, Marriott International
- Best Overall: Multi-Unit Chain Restaurant: Applebee's Neighborhood Grill & Bar, Hooters of America, Lazy Dog Restaurants
- Best Beverage Menu: Bar Louie, Marella Cruises & The Apollo Group, Virgin Voyages
- Best Spirits Program: BJ's Restaurant & Brewhouse, Delta Sky Club, Princess Cruises
- Best Beer Program: BJ's Restaurant & Brewhouse, Marella Cruises & The Apollo Group, PENN Entertainment
- Best Overall: Cruise Line: Princess Cruises, Royal Caribbean International
- Best Beverage Limited Time Offer: Delaware North, Pacifica Hotels, Virgin Voyages
- Best Overhaul of Beverage Program: Hyatt Hotels, Maggiano's Little Italy, Taco Mac

The Vibe Vista Awards entries were evaluated on positive beverage sales initiatives, operational innovations, and training and service programs. The awards will be announced at Vibe Conference, taking place March 3-5, 2025 in San Diego, CA.
